channel.title: Entrepreneur on Ian Teda
channel.description: Recent content in Entrepreneur on Ian Teda

item.title: The Idea Value Proposition
item.description: “Daring ideas are like chessmen moved forward. They may be beaten, but they may start a winning game.” – Johann Wolfgang von Goethe Ideas are easy, cheap even. It is the execution that is hard and because it is hard it is worth millions. If the execution wasn’t hard everyone would be doing it. And if everyone was doing it, then it would be worthless and quickly become a race to the bottom.
